meanings.definition: The quality or state of being simpleminded.
meanings.sent1: Her simplemindedness made her believe everything she heard.
meanings.sent2: His simplemindedness often led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: The simplemindedness of the robot made it follow the same routine every day.
meanings.sent4: The simplemindedness of the plan was its greatest strength in its simplicity.
meanings.sent5: The simplemindedness of the child's question made everyone smile.

meanings.definition: Lack of intelligence or mental capacity.
meanings.sent1: The simplemindedness of the character added humor to the story.
meanings.sent2: His simplemindedness was evident in his inability to solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The simplemindedness of the cat trying to catch its own tail was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The simplemindedness of the computer program resulted in errors.
meanings.sent5: Her simplemindedness in math made her struggle with basic calculations.

meanings.definition: A lack of sophistication or complexity.
meanings.sent1: The simplemindedness of the design appealed to those seeking simplicity.
meanings.sent2: His simplemindedness in fashion led to a minimalist style.
meanings.sent3: The simplemindedness of the recipe made it perfect for beginners.
meanings.sent4: The simplemindedness of the solution surprised everyone with its effectiveness.
meanings.sent5: Her simplemindedness in decorating resulted in a cozy and uncluttered space.
